info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 16 at 4:19PM EDT until June 16 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE HAS EXTENDED SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 318 TO INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING AREAS UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA IN MARYLAND THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MARYLAND PRINCE GEORGES IN SOUTHERN MARYLAND CALVERT CHARLES IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 13 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL VIRGINIA ORANGE IN NORTHERN VIRGINIA ARLINGTON CITY OF ALEXANDRIA CITY OF FAIRFAX CITY OF FALLS CHURCH CITY OF MANASSAS CITY OF MANASSAS PARK CULPEPER FAIRFAX FAUQUIER LOUDOUN PRINCE WILLIAM STAFFORD THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALEXANDRIA, ARLINGTON, BOWIE, CAMP SPRINGS, CHANTILLY, CHESAPEAKE BEACH, CLINTON, COLLEGE PARK, CULPEPER, DUNKIRK, FAIRFAX, FALLS CHURCH, FALMOUTH, GORDONSVILLE, GREENBELT, HERNDON, HUNTINGTOWN, LAUREL, LEESBURG, LUSBY, MANASSAS, MANASSAS PARK, MCLEAN, NORTH BEACH, ORANGE, PRINCE FREDERICK, RESTON, ST. CHARLES, STERLING, SUITLAND-SILVER HILL, WALDORF, WARRENTON, WASHINGTON, AND WOODBRIDGE.
